sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Public Health Standing Orders Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Public Health Standing Orders Act.

sections.heading: Public health orders; standing physician protocols
sections.text: Public health standing orders, also referred to as standing physician protocols, issued pursuant to this Act shall contain, at the minimum, the following elements:

sections.heading: Health care personnel; standing orders
sections.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law to the contrary, health care personnel may provide medical services within a public health clinic in conformance with standing orders issued by a public health standing orders physician without prior establishment of
